mainHeaderSection.heading: Imports & Exports
mainHeaderSection.maintitle: Manage Trade Deals with Import Export Software
mainHeaderSection.description: Manage leads, track sales, and boost engagement with a unified CRM platform.

featureSections.featuredesc: Tech Cloud ERP streamlines international trade by covering PO and GRN imports, customs duties, stock entries, supplier payments, financial records, order exports, inventory tracking, shipment handling, freight cost control, invoices and payment receipts. A single platform to manage compliance, logistics and finances for import and export efficiency.

Tech Cloud ERP streamlines global trade by delivering insightful inquiries and reports across imports and exports. Businesses gain full visibility into purchase orders, GRN, tax and compliance records, shipment tracking, freight cost analysis, invoicing and collections. It further supports profitability review, financial summaries, port schedules, BL submissions and document or courier claims, ensuring smooth and efficient trade operations.

Tech Cloud ERP provides a centralized setup for managing key master data essential to import and export operations. It streamlines supplier and warehouse records, defines payment terms and supports customs and pricing structures. Users can configure licenses, ETD schedules and certificates, while also handling claim types. This foundation ensures consistency, compliance and efficiency across global trade activities.

videosection.title: Simplify Cross-Border Trade
videosection.description: Handle foreign trade documentation, duty payments and logistics with ease. This module helps you stay compliant and avoid delays — while managing vendors, freight and timelines.

faqs.subTitle: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.title: Everything You Need to Know About Our CRM Solution

items.question: What is the purpose of the import and export module in ERP?
items.answer: The import and export module helps in managing international trade activities by tracking shipments, managing documentation, handling duties and taxes and ensuring compliance with global trade regulations.

items.question: Can I track the status of international shipments in real time?
items.answer: Yes, the system allows you to monitor shipment progress, check delivery timelines and stay updated on customs clearance—giving you better visibility throughout the process.

items.question: What is the Imports & Exports module in ERP?
items.answer: This module manages international trade operations, including customs documentation, shipping and export incentives.

items.question: Is it suitable for business dealing with multiple countries and regulations?
items.answer: Yes, the module is built to handle diverse international trade requirements, including multi-currency support, regional tax rules and regulatory compliance across borders.
